task.title: Change Default Media Folders
task.shortdesc: Change the default location for project media.

step.cmd: Click the Select Media Folders button in the Other Actions pane.
step.stepresult: The Preferences dialog will open, with the Media tab selected. This tab is accessible from any Phon window by choosing the Edit Preferences menu item and selecting Media from the Preferences dialog.

step.cmd: Click the Add folder to list.../+ button, locate the desired folder in the resulting Browse window and click Open.
step.stepresult: The selected folder will appear in the Media Folders field.

step.cmd: Repeat Step 2 for all desired media folders.
To sort the list of media folders by priority, select a folder from the list and click the up/down arrows to the right of the Media Folders field.
step.stepresult: If media files in two or more default media folders have the same name, the ones in the lower-priority folders will be displayed in Session Information with their full path.
